summary: This mod adds a dialogue option where you tell Mirabelle you don\'t need a tour and the game will move you on a stage bypassing stage 40 (the tour) and carries on \"First Lessons\"
descriptionHtml:
NO COLLEGE TOUR


Just a very quick mod that allows you to tell Mirabelle that you don\'t need a tour of the college, after all once you\'ve played through once or twice you don\'t really need it and following NPC\'s around seems to take forever. 

This mod adds a dialogue option where you tell Mirabelle you don\'t need a tour and the game will move you on a stage bypassing stage 40 (the tour) and carries on \"First Lessons\"

Version 2.0

Fixed a bug that had crept in where sometimes the quest wouldn\'t move on after speaking to Mirabelle. Also made her dialogue stay onscreen
author: NeilUK02

files.name: No Winterhold College Tour
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a bug which meant the quest wouldn\'t always move on to the next stage
Made Mirabelle\'s dialogue stay onscreen longer
